title: How to Use AI to Manage Your Time as a Student
description: I spoke with real students about common time management pitfalls, and came up with this list of artificial intelligence tools that can help you find your balance.
content: Every semester, at least one student in my class inevitably falls prey to poor time management. And despite what you may think, teachers and professors aren't twirling their mustaches and cackling over students not handing in their papers on time. It... [3716 chars]

title: Ashwini Vaishnaw Says Governance Framework For AI To Be Out By Sept 28
description: For the purpose of safeguarding citizens from the demerits of Artificial Intelligence and map the checks and balances required over the use of AI, the government has an AI governance framework in the pipeline to be released by Sept 28, IT Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw told news agency PTI on Thursday. He added, however, that the framework would not be 'prescriptive'.

title: Google Adds Gemini to Chrome After Dodging Forced Sale
description: Google is incorporating its Gemini artificial intelligence model throughout the Chrome browser, just two weeks after dodging an antitrust case that could have broken up the company.
content:

title: AI is coming for jobs. Why it’s better to be an investor than an employee
description: Artificial intelligence is helping companies reduce costs and become more efficient. As their profits rise, so do their stock prices
content:

title: Open-Source AI Models Boost Competition, DOJ Antitrust Head Says
description: Open artificial intelligence models that developers are able to use with few or no restrictions are critical to a competitive market in the rapidly evolving technology, a senior Justice Department official said.
content:

title: Children's best interests should anchor Canada's approach to their online privacy
description: In 2025, the rapid rise of artificial intelligence access for the public at large also means growing concern about the mental health impact of screen time on children and their AI engagement.

title: Moody's flags risk in Oracle's $300 billion of recently signed AI contracts
description: WASHINGTON, D.C. ― US credit rating agency Moody’s Ratings flagged several potential risks in Oracle Corp.’s $300 billion of recently signed artificial intelligence (AI) contracts, but stopped short of taking ratings action against the software giant.

title: ‘AI will not solve Philippine corruption’
description: FORMER Commission on Audit (COA) commissioner Heidi Mendoza on Thursday said that artificial intelligence (AI) will not curb corruption in the Philippines because of fragmented data systems, poor accountability, and the government’s failure to modernize financial processes.
